name: Flamethrower
help:
Delivers magic damage over time to all enemies in a cone before you.
Potency: 500
Duration: 5s
Gauss Barrel Effect: Heat Gauge gradually increases by 10 while Flamethrower is active. Heat Gauge not affected when used outside battle.
Additional Effect: Fire damage over time, stacking up to 5 times
Potency: 500
Duration: 6s
Effect ends upon using another action or moving (including facing a different direction).
